mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.`name`, m.parent_id, m.href, m.sort, m.remarks, m.del_flag FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.account = #{account} and m.del_flag = '0'
SELECT sm1.*, sm2.`name` AS parent_name FROM sys_menu sm1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm2 ON sm1.parent_id = sm2.id WHERE sm1.del_flag = '0'
SELECT sm1.*, sm2.`name` AS parent_name FROM sys_menu sm1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm2 ON sm1.parent_id = sm2.id WHERE sm1.del_flag = '0' AND sm1.id = #{id}
